attributes.action: Give Professor Chris Whitty a Knighthood for his services to Health and Science.
attributes.additional_details: He has provided valuable knowledge, advice, leadership and services to Health and Science during the coronavirus. Everyone has seen it on National Briefings and behind the scenes.
attributes.background: Give Chris Whitty a Knighthood. Make him, Professor Sir Chris Whitty.

rejection.details: You can find out how to nominate someone for an honour at http://www.gov.uk/honours
